tests_executed.description: DELETE /api/todos/{id} returns 200 status for valid deletion
Deleted todo is returned in response with all fields
Todo is actually removed from storage, other todos remain
Deleted todo cannot be retrieved from storage afterward

success_criteria_met: DELETE /api/todos/{id} returns 200 status for valid deletion

Verify todo is actually removed from storage
